Title: Ballavpur Ki Roopkatha
Actors: Anil Charanjeett, Abha Parmar, Ankita Shrivastav, Pradhuman Singh
Plot: Bhupati, the King of a sleepy town called Ballavpur, owns a huge but dilapidated royal palace and 7 acres of land. But Bhupati, crippled by a huge debt, dreams of moving to Calcutta after ...
